doc:
Vincent Ball https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vincent_Ball 0 Vincent Martin Ball OAM (born 4 December 1923) is a retired Australian-born character actor of stage and screen, active in the industry for some 65 years firstly in Britain and then his native Australia. He is best known for film and television series, including roles in A Town Like Alice, Phar Lap, Breaker Morant, and Muriel's Wedding. Vincent_Martin_Ball_OAM ( born_4_December_1923 ) is a_retired_Australian-born_character_actor of stage_and_screen , active in the_industry for some_65_years firstly in Britain and then his_native_Australia . He is_best_known for film_and_television_series , including roles in A_Town Like Alice , Phar_Lap , Breaker_Morant , and Muriel 's_Wedding .
